thread.name: Colleen from the Seattle Maktub show on the 4th

email.subject: Colleen from the Seattle Maktub show on the 4th

text.sentence: Hey Bill (or do you prefer William Williams the 3rd), What's up?
I bet you didn't think I'd e-mail you.
Don't worry, I have nothing against players.
I hope you had a good time at the show last weekend.
I know they play around Seattle frequently so I'll check them out again sometime.
Maybe you'll luck out and they'll come to Portland soon.
I'm sure you have a decent music scene in Portland so you always have other options.
I've found that you can find some really cool little bands or musicians in the most random little bars and restaurants.
I hope all is well in Portland at the moment.
Seattle has been pretty sunny and warm so I can't complain.
I'm totally looking forward to summer.
There will be something to do every weekend.
Time to start taking all my "sick" days!
If you do, make sure you play harder to make up for it.
text.signature: Talk to you later. Colleen (the first)
